name: Robot Bestfriends
description:
In Robot Bestfriends you control two robots who are best friends. They share everything, even your controller! Each analogue stick moves a player and both shoulder buttons fire. One best friend collects health and ammo and the other protects them. If one should perish the other dies of loneliness and you lose.

Keep their friendship together for as long as you can! There is no score or points here, only the survival of their friendship!

This was a game made at TOJAM 10, made in 3 days.
